1.content:
Briana White was relaxing on her couch playing her Nintendo switch. She wore a greyish t-shirt, blue jean shorts that left little to the imagination and was completely bare foot.Briana played her game for about half an hour when an odd message appear on her screen.

         "Click here to play the ultimate game?" the young voice actress read out loud in confusion.

         Then a smile appeared on her face. Perhaps Nintendo was somehow sending her invitation to test some new game. Without hesitation Briana clicked on the message. Suddenly, there was a blinding light and Briana cried out in shock.

         When the light faded Briana blinked as her eyes readjusted. Then she screamed as she saw that she was no longer in her home and everything was gigantic. Judging by her surroundings the young voice actress appeared to somehow have been shrunk to about an inch in height. But where was Briana?
1.title: Briana White Shrinks

13.title: A Forest

152.title: The Zoo

1521.content: which sized mammals will eat you?
1521.title: Mammals

info.brief_description: Briana White shrinks and will soon be eaten.
info.description:
Briana White mysteriously shrinks down to an inch in size. To make matters worse she now finds herself at the bottom of the food chain. How long can she survive before before she winds up in a belly?

Briana White as she appears in this story: https://pics.wikifeet.com/Briana-White-Feet-3057722.jpg

Rules:
1.) Briana can not grow or shrink more
2.) Briana is not immune to digestion
3.) All story lines must eventually end with Briana being eaten
4.) Humans must be mostly unaware of Briana at her new size
5.) Any human who notices Briana must either think she is a bug or be willing to treat her as food.
6.) Soft and cock vore only
7.) Have Fun
8.) No Dead ending the story.
info.pretty_title: Briana White Shrunk and a Snack
